name: KSG Red Lonsdale (Privada CC Exclusive)
additionalNotes:
Came with Privada Cigar club subscription box for June '21.

https://privadacigarclub.com/shop/rojas-ksg-red-lonsdale-privada-exclusive-aged-9-months/

"Noel Rojas is taking the cigar industry by storm, like it or not. There are a ton of Cuban immigrants in this business, but it is pretty cool to see a one-man show that really has not been here very long take a piece of the market for himself. Watch our interview with him on YouTube. He dodged the law and communism to be here and his cigars are made with a knowledge and spirit of Cuba. Noel is a tobacco philosopher with roots in the old world and branches in the new one. This cigar won awards with the lancero format and Noel wanted Privada members to have a size of their own. KSG stands for King of the Small Gauge. Let’s enjoy this cigar together and show our gratitude for Señor Rojas’s work!"
